mapper.select: select idx, writer, subject, SUBSTR(content,1,10) as content, writedate from cscenter
mapper.insert: insert into cscenter (idx, writer, subject, content, writedate) values (NEXTVAL('seq_idx'), #{writer}, #{subject}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: select idx, writer, subject, content, writedate from cscenter where idx = #{idx}

select idx, writer, subject, SUBSTR(content,1,10) as content, writedate from cscenter where 1=1
and writer like '%'||#{value}||'%'
